BucketName.description: Specifies a name for the bucket. The bucket name must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, dots (.), and hyphens (-). A directory bucket name must be unique in the chosen Availability Zone. The bucket name must also follow the format 'bucket_base_name--az_id--x-s3' (for example, 'DOC-EXAMPLE-BUCKET--usw2-az2--x-s3'). If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the bucket name.
BucketName.markdownDescription:
Specifies a name for the bucket. The bucket name must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, dots (.), and hyphens (-). A directory bucket name must be unique in the chosen Availability Zone. The bucket name must also follow the format 'bucket_base_name--az_id--x-s3' (for example, 'DOC-EXAMPLE-BUCKET--usw2-az2--x-s3'). If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the bucket name.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-z0-9][a-z0-9//.//-]*[a-z0-9]$  
Update requires: Replacement

LocationName.description: Specifies the AZ ID of the Availability Zone where the directory bucket will be created. An example AZ ID value is 'use1-az5'.
LocationName.markdownDescription:
Specifies the AZ ID of the Availability Zone where the directory bucket will be created. An example AZ ID value is 'use1-az5'.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

DataRedundancy.description: Specifies the number of Avilability Zone that's used for redundancy for the bucket.
DataRedundancy.markdownDescription:
Specifies the number of Avilability Zone that's used for redundancy for the bucket.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SingleAvailabilityZone  
Update requires: Replacement

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption
